reference.title: Katatedori shihonage
reference.shortdesc: Four direction throw (shihonage) from opposite hand grab (katatedori).

section.p: May be performed omote or ura.
Omote: Uke grabs Nage's opposite hand.

image.alt: Shows the beginning of katatedori shihonage omote, where Nage has grabbed Uke's arm above the wrist and is making his initial step across the front of Uke's body.
